abstract: Cerner Corp wins multimillion-dollar Defense Dept contract to digitize health records of more than 9.5 million military personnel and beneficiaries.
lead_paragraph: The contract aims to let the Defense Department and the Veterans Affairs Department electronically transmit records to each other, a function they currently cannot do.

headline.main: Cerner Wins Bid to Redo Health Data
headline.print_headline: Cerner Wins Bid to Redo Health Data

snippet: The contract aims to let the Defense Department and the Veterans Affairs Department electronically transmit records to each other, a function they currently cannot do.
